Package labs.pm.model

Class Drink

  • java.lang.Object
    • labs.pm.model.Product
      • labs.pm.model.Drink
  • final class Drink
extends Product
    Drink class represents properties and behaviors of drink products in the Product Management System.
    Each drink product has a best before date of today.
    Version:
    6.0
    Author:
    oracle

    • Method Detail

      • getDiscount

        public BigDecimal getDiscount()
        Calculates discount based on product price and discount rate. The discount price is zero while the current time comes before 4:30p or after 5:30p local time.
        Overrides:
        getDiscount in class Product
        Returns:
        a BigDecimal value of the discount

      • getDiscount

        BigDecimal getDiscount​(LocalTime compareTime)
        Calculates discount based on product price and discount rate. The discount price is zero while the current time comes before 4:30p or after 5:30p local time.
        Parameters:
        compareTime - a time to use to perform the check.
        Returns:
        a BigDecimal value of the discount
